title: The Last Newspaper Boy in America
description:
Wil David can't wait to take over his brother's paper route. For years it has been the tradition in his family to hand over the route to the next boy in line on his twelfth birthday, and Wil is just about to turn twelve and get his chance to put his sidearm throw into action. But when the newspaper company cancels delivery to Wil's small town, it's up to him to fight to save the route. Along the way, he unravels a carnival mystery, exposes a con artist, rescues his little town, and becomes a true hero.Book Details: 
   Format: Paperback 
   Publication Date: 9/16/2010 
   Pages: 208 
   Reading Level: Age 10 and Up
author: Sue Corbett
